what type of crystals would you for spirit communication!

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:          Rees

Crystals are used for channeling the spirits energy. I use crystals 
during meditation and have had great results with spirit 
communication. I assume by adding the crystal to the Minibox it 
would increase spirit communication giving the spirit another 
channel to go though.

Kay

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@...> 
wrote:
>
> This is going to sound crazy, but I'll keep my clicking. I don't 
hear it anymore during the session. I just like an old person when 
they get use to something, they will keep it. Nothing new. But I 
am in the market for a Mini Box with the crystal enhancer. Does 
anybody know what the crystal enhance does? I know that crystal 
have energy, but what is the enhancer?
> 
> Rees
> 
>
